title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
description: When attempting to use the 'Close All Saved' feature from the file menu, it does not always close all the saved files as expected.
OB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, some saved files remain open in the editor.
EB: After selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu, all saved files should be closed and no files should remain open in the editor.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code. 2. Create a new file (e.g. f1.txt). 3. Open multiple files and save them. 4. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu. 5. Verify that all saved files are closed and no files remain open in the editor.
